title: [Hextech crafting, new client] Opening 2nd hextech chest gave no loot but removed key & chest.
body:
On Friday (03/03/2017) evening, after a game of ARURF, I had two chests and two (forged) keys.  I then opened two hextech chests.

* Upon clicking the "open" button the first time, a chest & key were consumed and I received loot.

* Upon clicking the "open" button again (to trigger the opening of a second chest), the client froze.

* I closed the client.

* Upon opening the client again, no loot had been rewarded for the second chest, but a chest and a key had been removed.

***

**Q1**: Is this a known bug?  (I.e., should I submit this to the bug report board also? I didn't see it there or in the knowledge base.)

**Q2**: Is there any fix? (I.e., is there any way to recover either the loot that should have been awarded, or the chest and the key?)

(Note: thanks in advance for help. I don't remember the last time I had to contact support.)

replies.body:
What you experienced can happen if your connection briefly fluctuates to our servers. It doesn't actually affect your loot, but it affects the ability to receive notification of what your loot was or in some cases, crashes the client entirely. I took a look at your account and it seems this chest yielded a Nightshade Serpent Summoner Icon and 150 Orange Essence.

I hope this helped!
